疫苗技术的进步：探索 N1-甲基假尿苷对 mRNA 翻译的影响研究人员探索了 N1-甲基假尿苷 (1-methylΨ) 掺入 mRNA 中如何影响核糖体移码和 mRNA 翻译的整体保真度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/A-step-forward-in-vaccine-technology-Exploring-the-effects-of-N1-methylpseudoouridine-in-mRNA-translation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/A-step-forward-in-vaccine-technology-Exploring-the-effects-of-N1-methylpseudoouridine-in-mRNA-translation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d8104d3-cb92-472a-ab15-223291d9b1d7 Thu, 07 Dec 2023 09:12:00 -0500 A step forward in vaccine technology: Exploring the effects of N1-methylpseudouridine in mRNA translation

Optibrium 的量子力学和机器学习方法预测药物代谢途径发表在 Xenobiotica 上的同行评审研究描述了一种创新的新方法，该方法比其他方法具有更高的灵敏度和更高的精度来预测 I 期和 II 期代谢的途径和产物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Optibriume28099s-Quantum-Mechanics-and-Machine-Learning-Methods-Predict-Routes-of-Drug-Metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231207/Optibriume28099s-Quantum-Mechanics-and-Machine-Learning-Methods-Predict-Routes-of-Drug-Metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=265ba288-31d2-466e-8ff1-bfaca9244cfd Thu, 07 Dec 2023 06:09:00 -0500 Optibrium’s Quantum Mechanics and Machine Learning Methods Predict Routes of Drug Metabolism
